entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning early this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle. Local amount 2 cm. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 01 January 2023
